Sharks don’t have bones.
Avocados are berries.
An ostrich’s eye is bigger than its brain.
The Eiffel Tower can grow taller in summer.
Some frogs can freeze solid and still survive.
Banana plants are actually herbs, not trees.
Rats and mice laugh when tickled.
A day on Mercury lasts 59 Earth days.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on Earth.
Elephants can’t jump.
Crows can recognize human faces.
The heart of a blue whale is the size of a small car.
Butterflies remember being caterpillars.
Pineapples take about two years to grow.
Jellyfish are 95% water.
Ants never sleep.
Your body has more bacteria than human cells.
Dogs’ sense of smell is about 40 times stronger than humans.
Some fish can walk on land.
A sneeze can travel up to 100 miles per hour.
